=== Table example ===

Colons can be used to align columns.

{|
! Tables
!align="center"| Are
!align="right"| Cool
|-
| col 3 is
|align="center"| right-aligned
|align="right"| $1600
|-
| col 2 is
|align="center"| centered
|align="right"| $12
|-
| zebra stripes
|align="center"| are neat
|align="right"| $1
|}
